objects.text:
Premium Flyknit Construction
Iconic High-Top Silhouette
Striking Gold Swoosh Detail
Superior Comfort & Traction

product_details.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Flyknit - Wolf Grey/Golden Swoosh Edition
product_details.description:
• Premium Flyknit upper construction for lightweight breathability
• Iconic high-top silhouette with modern technology
• Striking grey colorway with metallic gold Nike swoosh
• Classic gum rubber outsole for superior traction
• Engineered mesh pattern for enhanced durability
• Air-cushioned midsole for all-day comfort
• Signature Jordan brand wing logo detailing
• Versatile design perfect for both street style and casual wear
• Responsive cushioning system for optimal support
• Traditional lacing system for secure fit

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and clean layout centered around a sports footwear promotion. A bold heading (`heading`) introduces the product name in a strong serif font, followed by a vibrant subheading (`subheading`) in uppercase and golden yellow for emphasis. Supporting details (`description`) are listed in a refined sans-serif font, describing product highlights. A prominent product image (`product_image`) of grey sneakers with a gold swoosh is centered on a subtle radial circular background. The price (`price`) is displayed at the bottom left in bold style. A yellow call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`) invites the user to shop now.

**Color Palette:**
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Soft Grey (#F5F5F5)
- Charcoal (#333333)
- Mid Grey (#595959)
- Golden Yellow (#D4A017)
product_color: The product image features a modern sneaker with a minimalist yet striking color palette. The base color is a light grayish-blue knit fabric (Hex: #C5C8CE), giving it a clean and airy look. Warm mustard yellow (Hex: #D2982B) is used for the Nike swoosh, logo, and outsole edge, creating sharp contrast and drawing attention to the branding elements. The white midsole (Hex: #F3F3F3) adds freshness while balancing the overall look. These colors blend harmoniously with smooth transitions but are strategically placed to highlight structure and design features. This palette is ideal for a contemporary and sporty advertisement banner.
